description: Conversion of roof space to habitable use to include a rear dormer with juliette balcony, 2 front roof lights and conversion of roof from hip to gable end. Erection of a front porch and single storey extension to rear (Application for a Certificate of Lawful Development for a Proposed Development)
decision_conditions: The proposed development does not constitute permitted development as the proposed rear extension would extend beyond the rear dwelling by 3.5m. Additionally, the proposed porch would exceed the permitted ground floor area allowance of 3sq and the maximum height of 3m. Both aspects of development would be contrary to the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). Therefore, the proposal would not meet the criteria set out for Classes A and D of Schedule 2, Part 1, of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
